page.title: Burkes Letter in Answer to Paine

revision.comment: Created page with "Possibly: Reflections on the Revolution in France and on the proceedings in certain societies in London relative to that event, in a letter intended to have been sent to a g..."
revision.text: Possibly: Reflections on the Revolution in France and on the proceedings in certain societies in London relative to that event, in a letter intended to have been sent to a gentleman in paris by the Right Honourable Edmund Burke. (London : Printed for J. Dodsley, in Pall-Mall, M.DCC.XC. [1790]). http://library.st-andrews.ac.uk/record=b2435950~S1
